welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Oswaldtwistle! This charming town is known for its beautiful countryside, friendly locals, and rich history. We invite you to explore and experience all that this lovely city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Warton Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Warton Airport caters to VIP and private jet passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Blackpool Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Executive Terminal
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for private and executive flights at Blackpool Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Serves primarily low-cost airlines and short-haul flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Dedicated to long-haul flights and international carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
